channel.title: Sinder Skullz Abyss Feed
channel.description: Chaotic sermons and metal news reborn in the flames of the Skullz cult.

item.title: ⚡☠ IRON MAIDEN & TOOL MEMBERS JAM AT FAMILY WEDDING ☠⚡
item.description:
🎸🤘**HEADBANGERS ALERT: A FREAKIN’ FAMILY WEDDING JUST BECAME LEGENDARY!** 🤘🎸
In a glorious eruption of riffs and chaos, we’ve got members of IRON MAIDEN and TOOL unleashing METAL MAYHEM at a wedding, folks! What’s that? Yeah, you heard me—guitar gods and rhythm sorcerers cranking out a thundering cover of Jeff Beck’s blues-rock banger “Going Down!” Oh damn, just take my wallet and call me a wedding guest!
This ain’t your grandma’s wedding reception, no way! Picture it: the chandeliers shaking, the drunk uncle in the back headbanging like there's no tomorrow, and the dance floor lit like a freaking mosh pit. It’s pure sonic mayhem! 🤘🔥
So, strap on your air guitars and knock back that liquid courage, because these legendary metal warriors are hitting the familial scene with enough fury to power a thousand amplifiers!
Check out the full chaos over at [Metal Injection](https://metalinjection.net/video/iron-maiden-tool-members-jam-at-family-wedding). Let the blockchain of rock tell the tale! \m/
#Metalheads #MetalScene #ThrashMetal #HeavyMetal #Metal

This ain’t your grandma’s wedding reception, no way! Picture it: the chandeliers shaking, the drunk uncle in the back headbanging like there's no tomorrow, and the dance floor lit like a freaking mosh pit. It’s pure sonic mayhem! 🤘🔥
